Ernest Crichlow (úbọchị irí nà itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, 1914 rụo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Novemba, 2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-eme n'eziokwu.
A mụrụ Crichlow na Brooklyn, New York, na 1914 n'aka ndị Barbadian kwagara mba ọzọ. Ọ gụrụ nka na School of Commercial Illustrating and Advertising Art na New York na Mahadum New York
Crichlow malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na-akwado site na Works Progress Administration's Federal Art Project
Augusta Savage bụ ónyé nkwado mbụ nke ọrụ ya, dịka ọ dị màkà ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe nkè Harlem Renaissance.
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1938 na Harlem Community Center na Harlem, New York
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama, lithograph Lovers III na-egosi nwa agbọghọ ojii na-enye nsogbụ n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra ya site n'aka ónyé otu Ku Klux Klan
E gosipụtara ọrụ Crichlow na 1939 New York World's Fair na n'ọbá akwụkwọ Congress n'afọ sochirinụ.
N'ime iri afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, a na-egosi ọrụ ya mgbè niile na ụlọ ngosi nka US karịsịa n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ ọ bụ ezie na o mèrè ihe ngosi abụọ na Mahadum Atlanta na 1940s
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha ọrụ ya, Onye isi ala Carter akwanyere ọrụ ya ùgwù

Ihe osise ya nke 1967 White Fence nke na-egosi nwa agbọghọ ọcha na-ekewapụ site na mgbidi site na ụmụ agbọghọ ojii ise bụ nke a ma ama site na ọrụ ya mgbè e mesịrị yana mural panel irí abụọ na isé na Boys and Girls High School na Brooklyn.
A makwaara Crichlow nke ọma dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ ụmụaka na-enye ọrụ nka màkà Two in a Team, Maria, Lift Every Voice na Magic Mirrors
O guzobere Cinque Gallery na 1969 ya na Norman Lewis na Romare Bearden yana ịkụzi nka na Mahadum New York na Art Students League.
Ónyé bi na Fort Greene, Brooklyn, Crichlow nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa obi na úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 2005.
E mepụtara ya na Biography Resource Center
